project_profile.name: Food Delivery App
project_profile.description: We are building a food delivery app for 10,000 users per month.

mock_billing.desc: Compute cost for Node.js backend (4 vCPUs, 16 GB RAM) on GCP: 4 * $0.0625 per vCPU * 720 hours + 16 * $0.0625 per GB * 720 hours
Database cost for PostgreSQL (1 TB storage, 100,000 I/Os) on GCP: 1 * $0.065 per GB * 720 hours + 100,000 * $0.000004 per I/O * 720 hours
Storage cost for Object Storage (100 GB storage) on GCP: 100 * $0.04 per GB * 720 hours
Networking cost for Food Delivery App (100,000 egress bytes) on GCP: 100,000 * $0.000004 per byte * 720 hours
Monitoring cost for Food Delivery App (100,000 metrics) on GCP: 100,000 * $0.000004 per metric * 720 hours
No cost for Containers as it's not used in the project
Security cost for Food Delivery App (100,000 security rules) on GCP: 100,000 * $0.000004 per rule * 720 hours
Analytics cost for Food Delivery App (100,000 events) on GCP: 100,000 * $0.000004 per event * 720 hours

recommendations.title: Rightsizing Compute Instances
recommendations.description: Downgrade the Node.js backend from 4 vCPUs, 16 GB RAM to 2 vCPUs, 8 GB RAM to reduce costs.
steps: Identify the current instance type and its configuration
Choose a more cost-effective instance type with similar performance
Update the instance type in the deployment script

recommendations.title: Optimize PostgreSQL Database Cost
recommendations.description: Downgrade PostgreSQL instance from 1 TB storage to 512 GB storage to reduce costs.
steps: Check the current PostgreSQL instance configuration
Downgrade the instance to 512 GB storage
Monitor the instance performance after the downgrade

recommendations.title: Optimize Storage Cost by Migrating to Cold Storage
recommendations.description: Migrate infrequently accessed data to cold storage to reduce storage costs.
steps: Identify infrequently accessed data
Migrate data to cold storage
Configure data tiering

recommendations.title: Optimize Networking Costs for Food Delivery App
recommendations.description: Rightsize the network configuration to reduce egress bytes and optimize costs.
steps: Monitor network traffic and identify areas for optimization
Rightsize the network configuration to reduce egress bytes
Implement network traffic filtering and prioritization

recommendations.title: Optimize Monitoring Costs
recommendations.description: Downgrade the Monitoring service from Standard to Basic to reduce costs.
steps: Check the current Monitoring service configuration.
Downgrade the Monitoring service to Basic.
Verify the cost reduction.

recommendations.title: Optimize Containers Cost
recommendations.description: Containers are not being used in the project, so there is no cost associated with it. However, to follow the schema, we are providing a recommendation to optimize the cost of Containers.
steps: Check if Containers are being used in the project
If not, remove the Containers service from the project

recommendations.title: Optimize Security Service Cost
recommendations.description: Downgrade the Security service to a lower tier to reduce costs without compromising security.
steps: Review the current security rules and identify any unnecessary or redundant rules.
Downgrade the Security service to a lower tier that meets the project's security requirements.
Monitor the Security service usage and adjust the tier as needed to maintain optimal costs.
